ValidationRule.description: Requires "Rejection Reason and "Responsible Party" to have a value if "Reject" is selected as a case reason before Case can be moved to Closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && ISPICKVAL(Reason, "Reject") && ISBLANK(TEXT( QC_Responsible_Party__c )) ||
NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( QC_Responsible_Party__c ))) && ISBLANK( QC_Rejection_Reason__c ) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && ISPICKVAL(Reason, "Reject")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a value in the "Responsible Party" and "Rejection Reason" fields if this Case Reason has a value of Reject
